forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning changing to all rain for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 2-3cm of snow expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 3 to 5 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will diminish to a few snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will taper off as a few snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 34F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain or snow showers in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
